name: unnerve

effect.x_y: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.x_y: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
